EmailTemplate.name: PRM NIRA 15 Day Draft Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Submit your Nokia Indirect Reseller Application Form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for your interest in the Nokia Partner Program.
You started to fill out the Nokia Indirect Reseller Application Form and saved a draft under application number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
For Nokia to process your application, you must return to continue and submit the completed application.
To continue and submit your application: 1) navigate to this NIRA link 2) retrieve your draft application using your 8-digit application number 3) complete the application 4) read and accept the Nokia Indirect Reseller Agreement 5) click on “submit”.
If you do not submit within the next 15 days, your draft application will be rejected.
Don’t hesitate to contact partner.support@nokia.com if you need support.
The Nokia Partner Program Team
